key.name: script-path
key.summary: Path to the battery status script
key.description: Absolute path to a shell script that prints a single line like: "Discharging [========= ] 95 %" or "Charging [===== ] 40 %". The extension will parse percentage and state (Charging/Discharging).

key.name: refresh-seconds
key.description: How often to poll the script when present.

key.name: extra-path
key.description: Optional colon-separated directories to prepend to PATH when running external commands (e.g., /home/you/venv/bin). Used for resolving 'rivalcfg' without editing system PATH.
